name: Chainfire - Single
description:
'Chainfire' is the first single and video release by Tzar Bomber and is the opening track of their debut EP 'Melt on Like This'.


Released: July 10th, 2010

CD
01. Chainfire [Radio edit]
02. Chainfire (full version)
03. Lost Woods
04. Anna and the Crucifix (acoustic)

DVD
01. Chainfire single video

name: Melt On Like This - EP
description: Combining elements of alternative rock, grunge, indie, classic metal and many other genre's, we forged our sound in the depths of the Shoalhaven(Mt Doom), forging the one sound, to rule them all. With soaring melodies, unorthodox rhythms, mammoth riffs, crazy bass lines and ridiculous in-jokes we set about recording our first EP and debut release. Aided in our quest by audio kings Adrian Breakspeare (Bloc Party, Black Kids) and Ben Moore (Leonardo's Bride, Finn Brothers, Delinquent) as well as our new swanky manager Lachlan James, we set our first EP 'Melt On Like This' upon the world in October 2009.
